attributes.action: Send aid to the people of Palestine (Gaza and West Bank)
attributes.background: The U.K Government should help raise charities for the many civilians affected by the conflict in Gaza and the West Bank since many innocent civilians are deprived of water and electricity and fuel the U.K should send aid to Gaza and West Bank just as they sent aid to Ukraine 🇺🇦 they should

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge the Israel Government to allow fuel, electricity and food into Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383

Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337 

Call for Israel to immediately establish a humanitarian corridor in Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648642
